spell.accio.description: $(italic)Summons an object towards the caster. Handy for retrieving distant items.
spell.aguamenti.description: $(italic)Conjures a stream of water from the wand tip. Useful for extinguishing fires or filling containers.
spell.alarte_ascendare.description: $(italic)Launches objects high into the air. Great for creating diversions or obstacles.
spell.alohomora.description: $(italic)Unlocks doors and windows. A must-have for exploratory adventurers.
spell.arresto_momentum.description: $(italic)Slows down moving objects or beings. Ideal for preventing falls or controlling movement.
spell.ascendio.description: $(italic)Propels the caster high into the air. Perfect for reaching high places or escaping traps.
spell.avada_kedavra.description: $(italic)A lethal curse that instantly kills the target. Forbidden and highly dangerous.
spell.basic_cast.description: $(italic)The fundamental spell for beginners, used to practice casting techniques.
spell.bombarda.description: $(italic)Causes a small explosion. Effective for breaking barriers or creating entrances.
spell.bombarda_maxima.description: $(italic)A more powerful version of Bombarda, causing larger explosions.
spell.circumrota.description: $(italic)Rotates objects. Useful for puzzle solving or manipulating the environment.
spell.cistem_aperio.description: $(italic)Opens chests or boxes. Handy for uncovering hidden treasures.
spell.colloportus.description: $(italic)Magically locks doors or windows. Ideal for securing areas.
spell.confringo.description: $(italic)Creates fiery explosions. Used offensively or for clearing obstacles.
spell.crucio.description: $(italic)Inflicts intense pain on the target. Another forbidden and cruel curse.
spell.depulso.description: $(italic)Repels objects away from the caster. Effective for clearing space or pushing enemies.
spell.descendo.description: $(italic)Moves objects downward. Useful for accessing high-placed items.
spell.disillusio.description: $(italic)Creates an illusion to make the caster invisible. Perfect for stealth or evasion.
spell.engorgio.description: $(italic)Enlarges objects. Great for solving puzzles or creating barriers.
spell.episkey.description: $(italic)Heals minor injuries. Essential for adventurers facing constant danger.
spell.expelliarmus.description: $(italic)Disarms an opponent. A fundamental spell in duels.
spell.fumos.description: $(italic)Generates a smokescreen. Ideal for escapes or distractions.
spell.glacius.description: $(italic)Freezes objects or entities. Useful for creating pathways or immobilizing threats.
spell.herbivicus.description: $(italic)Accelerates the growth of plants. Perfect for gardeners and nature lovers.
spell.incendio.description: $(italic)Produces a jet of flames. Can be used for combat or lighting fires.
spell.levioso.description: $(italic)Makes objects levitate. Great for moving items without physical effort.
spell.lumos.description: $(italic)Creates a light at the wand's tip. Essential for illuminating dark places.
spell.melofors.description: $(italic)Encases the target's head in a pumpkin. Mainly used for humorous effect.
spell.morsmordre.description: $(italic)Conjures the Dark Mark. Traditionally a symbol of dark wizards.
spell.nebulus.description: $(italic)Creates a mist around the caster. Useful for concealment or creating an eerie atmosphere.
spell.nox.description: $(italic)Extinguishes light from the wand. Used to return to darkness after using Lumos.
spell.obscuro.description: $(italic)Blinds the target by covering their eyes. Can be used defensively in duels.
spell.petrificus_totalus.description: $(italic)Temporarily paralyzes the target. Effective for immobilizing opponents.
spell.protego.description: $(italic)Creates a magical shield. Blocks spells and physical objects.
spell.protego_diabolica.description: $(italic)Conjures a ring of protective fire. Keeps enemies at bay.
spell.protego_maxima.description: $(italic)Generates a powerful protective barrier. Ideal for safeguarding large areas.
spell.reducio.description: $(italic)Shrinks objects. Useful for storage or accessing small spaces.
spell.revelio.description: $(italic)Reveals hidden objects or entities. Crucial for uncovering secrets or hidden threats.
spell.sectumsempra.description: $(italic)Causes severe cuts on the target. A dangerous and aggressive spell.
spell.stupefy.description: $(italic)Stuns the target. Commonly used in combat to incapacitate enemies.
spell.tempest.description: $(italic)Conjures a small storm. Can be used to manipulate weather conditions.
spell.wingardium_leviosa.description: $(italic)Levitates and moves objects at will. A fundamental spell for manipulation and mobility.
spell.protego_maxima.claim.access_denied: Unknown magic is protecting this place
spell.protego_maxima.claim.already_exist: Magic is already protecting this place
spell_book.landing_text: Discover the art of spellcasting in this essential guide for Minecraft wizards and witches. Learn various spells to alter your world and defend against dark forces.
spell_book.spells.description: Spells are magical tools in Minecraft, categorized as Charms, Conjurations, Counter Spells, Curses, Healing, Jinxes, and Transfigurations. Each has unique applications in your adventures.
spell_book.wiki.description: The Wiki section is a comprehensive encyclopedia on Minecraft's magic, covering lore, mechanics, and history.
spell.type.charm.description: Charms alter or enhance properties, offering creative solutions and enchantments.
spell.type.counter_spell.description: Counter Spells are defensive, vital in duels and combat for protection.
spell.type.curse.description: Curses apply negative effects and require careful use due to their potency.
spell.type.healing.description: Healing spells restore health and cure ailments, crucial for survival.
spell.type.hex.description: Hexes cause minor inconveniences, useful for strategic scenarios.
spell.type.jinx.description: Jinxes apply temporary, humorous effects, ideal for light-hearted use.
spell.type.transfiguration.description: Transfiguration changes objects' forms, offering creative possibilities.
spell.type.conjuration.description: Conjuration summons entities or objects, essential for resourceful wizards.
spell_book.wiki.experience_vanilla.page1:
You can learn spells using this book, be aware that some spells have additional requirements that you have met at time of learning.

10 experience level is one spell point.
spell_book.wiki.experience_the_vault.pag:
You can learn spells using this book, be aware that some spells have additional requirements that you have met at time of learning.

Completing vault gives you spell experience
10 experience is equal to one spell point.
$(li) Monolith: 1$(li) Cake: 2$(li) Kill The Boss: 3$(li) Elixir: 3$(li) Paradox: 3$(li) Scavenger: 4$(li) Herald: 20
spell_book.wiki.floo_network.intro: The Floo Network is a magical transportation system in Minecraft, allowing instant travel between linked fireplaces. Inspired by wizarding lore, it transforms fireplaces into portals for quick and mystical travel.
spell_book.wiki.floo_network.how_to_setu: To set up the Floo Network, throw Floo Powder into a fire to convert it into a 'Floo Fireplace.' This links the fireplace to the network, enabling magical travel to and from that location.
spell_book.wiki.floo_network.privacy: For privacy, rename Floo Powder with a player's username and throw it into the fireplace. This makes the fireplace private, visible only to players whose names have been used with the powder in that fireplace.
spell_book.wiki.protego_maxima.intro: Protego Maxima is a powerful spell in Minecraft for claiming and managing territory. When cast, it claims a chunk of land, marking it as the caster's territory.
spell_book.wiki.protego_maxima.claiming: To claim a chunk, cast Protego Maxima on the desired area. The chunk where the spell hits becomes claimed and is recognized as your territory. If you crouch while casting, the spell unclaims the chunk instead.
spell_book.wiki.protego_maxima.whitelist: Casting Protego Maxima on another player adds them to your claim's whitelist, granting them access. If you are crouching while casting, it removes the player from your whitelist, revoking their access.
spell.apparition.description: $(italic)allows players to teleport directly to any Floo Network fireplace
